channel.title: Experience modes system wont work because makeover mage comes up?
channel.description: right I did a different experience modes system but when you make a new character you login in the experience modes pop up for a split second then it goes away again because my server has makeover mage set to pop up on log in how would i remove that so i can click the experience modes?

item.title: Experience modes system wont work because makeover mage comes up?
item.dc:creator: @Lordabyssal Lordabyssal
item.description:
@Lordabyssal wrote:

I would check the public void initialize() method as these are executed when you log-in.

Sorry in Client.java Server sided

Read full topic
item.source: Experience modes system wont work because makeover mage comes up?

item.title: Experience modes system wont work because makeover mage comes up?
item.dc:creator: @dun_dun_dun dun dun dun
item.description:
@dun_dun_dun wrote:

Iâ€™m not sure where your server is handling the makeover mage interface coming up but I would say start at where your log in message/where your log in stuff is handled, which should be in your client class.
